author: Reuters Editorial
title: New Relic Announces Proposed Offering Of $435 Mln Of Convertible Senior Notes
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - New Relic Inc:
* NEW RELIC ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF $435 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES
* NEW RELIC - INTENDS TO OFFER $435.0 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 IN A PRIVATE PLACEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
